channel.title: MAUI, c'est clair !
channel.description: Learn to build cool apps with .NET MAUI for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows, even if you just started !

item.title: Control the playback position
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Let's continue with the implementation of playhead control! The idea is to be able to move to a specific frame in the track.

item.title: Play music
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Brick after brick, our application is taking shape! But it's only visual for now... so letâ€™s bring all those dummy controls to life!

item.title: Target multiple environments in .NET MAUI
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: To validate new features in your application, it is best to test them in an isolated environment. This will prevent any risk of data loss from your users. In this document, you will learn how to set up different environments for your mobile application.

item.title: Create a .NET MAUI App without Shell
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Since the official release of .NET MAUI, it is not possible to create a new project where Visual Studio does not add a default Shell. Fortunately, there is a very simple way to get rid of it!

item.title: Volume display
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: We are almost done with the first big implementation phase of our main page. We'll now move on to the volume control!

item.title: Media playback controls
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: More and more buttons! In this chapter, we will integrate the controls for manipulating the media.

item.title: Timing display
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Now that the foundations of the main page are ready, we can start laying out all the controls. Let's start with the timing!

item.title: Scaffolding
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: Before developing a new page, it is best to think about the layout of the various elements. And you'll see, it's a real architect's job!

item.title: How to navigate
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: We are now starting to create the main page of the application. But new page also means, enable the user going to that page! So let's see how to implement the navigation from one page to another.

item.title: MVVM is the key to succeed
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: In this chapter, we will discover a major design pattern for mobile application development, the Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM)!
